Author: Anycrypt
Title: [ANN] Expercoin: Harvard-Incubated Protocol for Skill-Based Career Ecosystems
Body: This is perhaps the extremely ambitious scale of these plans, which may eventually separate Experkoin from the competition. On the other hand, there are also certain risks associated with this ICO. To begin with, there are other projects that aim to do something like this. It is impossible to ignore the possibility of increasing the thrust of the competing network. Similarly, they also cover a number of ISO standard risks, such as regulatory and legal changes in their white paper.
